DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate whether insulin sensitivity and insulin resistance of the human brain is comparable in all insulin sensitive parts of the brain and whether correlates to other phenotypic information (i.e. whole body insulin sensitivity, BMI, age) of the study participants.
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Sensitivity of the Human CNS System: fMRI Study With Intranasal Insulin Application
DOC.criteria: Normal routine blood works for women: negative pregnancy test healthy Type 2 diabetes pregnancy acute or chronic diseases Pacemakers Artificial heart valves Metal prostheses Implanted magnetic metal parts (screws, ...) Metal fragments Braces insulin pumps Tattoos claustrophobia reduced temperature sensation and / or increased sensitivity to warming of the body Ear disease or an increased sensitivity to loud noises
